title: ValueError: No insider trades returned (when selecting Sentiment Agent)
body:
**Describe the bug**
A ValueError is raised when sentiment agent is selected (my chosen ticker was 'ONON')

**Copy of Output - my PII redacted**

```
$ poetry run python src/main.py --ticker ONON --show-reasoning

...
...

File "/Users/.../.../ai-hedge-fund/src/agents/sentiment.py", line 25, in sentiment_agent
    insider_trades = get_insider_trades(
                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/Users/.../.../ai-hedge-fund/src/tools/api.py", line 162, in get_insider_trades
    raise ValueError("No insider trades returned")
ValueError: No insider trades returned
During task with name 'sentiment_agent' and id 'f03273d3-4704-b88b-9c55-e04c1c0721f1'
```

**Additional context**
I would love to see the output of the sentiment agent for 'ONON' :)
author: lewisosborne

comments.body:
Thank you for reporting @lewisosborne - I have made some changes to make this more graceful.

Instead of erroring out when data is missing, the agent will simply print an error message and continue (without crashing).

Fabulous! Thank you for adjusting @virattt 

I have updated branch and re-run cmds. Also, the 'backtester' output now works for me too (it was also failing on the same error).

This is a wonderful app :)

satisfaction_conditions: Graceful handling of missing insider trade data
Continued operation of the application when data is unavailable
Ability to see sentiment agent output for specific tickers
